duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct hands-on laboratory experimentation for evaluation and characterization of primary packaging components.
Perform standard primary packaging assessments such as moisture ingress and UV transmission testing.
Conduct mechanical testing methods including uniaxial tension and torsional testing.
Document results in laboratory notebooks and technical reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Material Science or related field with hands-on experience in GMP or cGMP environment.
